Content.Name: Resources
Content.Title: Resources
Content.BodyCopy:
Important Links

Dental Websites

ADA
The American Dental Association is the oldest and largest national dental society in the world. Their website can link you to their events, articles, and professional resources. Click here...

ADEA
The American Dental Education Association is the sole national organization representing academic dentistry. Most dental schools are a part of this organization and the DAT (Dental Admissions Test) is administered by them. Click here...

AADSAS
The Associated American  Dental School Application Service is the centralized application service that you can apply to most dental schools through. You are able to log on and complete one application that can be sent to the dental schools of your choice. This year's cycle opens June 3th. Click here...

Dental Care
Dental Care is a Crest/Oral-B sponsored website that is dedicated to education. This site is a great resource for not only free Continuing Education articles, but also for the beginners. There are articles on oral health conditions, dental procedures and proper oral hygiene techniques. Click here...

GoDental
Go Dental is an ADEA website dedicated to helping you become familiar with the dental profession. This site is designed to help you decide if dentistry is for you, and if it is, to help you find events in your area, advice on applying and resources to help you become more educated. Click here...

DAT Prep

Chad's Videos
Chad's videos are an online database of DAT prep videos that can be viewed by purchasing a subscription through CourseSaver.com. Chad has over 12 years of experience teaching pre-health students and his videos can help you review everything you need to know for the General Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, and Quantitative Reasoning sections of the DAT. Remember, members of the BYU-Idaho Pre-Dental Society get 30% off. Contact us for more details. Click here...

Ross' PAT Videos
Ross' videos are some of the only DAT PAT prep videos out there. They can be viewed by purchasing a subscription through PreDDS.net. BYU-Idaho Pre-Dental Society members get a $5 discount. Contact us for more details. Click here...

Student Doctor Network
The Student Doctor Network allows you to get in contact with other students from around the country who are interested in dentistry. There are students at all stages in their dental education as well as dental professionals who can give you advice. There are forums where you can buy and sell DAT supplies, ask about specific dental schools, prepare for interviews and much more. Click here...

School Resources

Academic Discovery Center
The Academic Discovery Center is the school's academic advising and career services center. They offer help with a number of different things including major selection, course sequencing, graduation planning and more. Click here...

Health Professions Website
The school's health professions website is a great resource for researching health professions. It provides documents that you can use to help you plan in your dental school pre-requisites among your major requirements. There is also links and important information about services that the school offers such as the Letter of Evaluation Service. Click here...

Society Resources
The BYU-Idaho Pre-Dental Society has worked hard in creating a database with all of the information we have accumulated over the years. We have made available PowerPoints that have been presented to us, documents we have been given, and advice that comes straight from our members that have already taken the DAT and applied. Click here...
